name: Maryanne Metz
text: BEST PIZZA FRANCHISE IN COLUMBIA. Highly recommend. Friendly staff, customizable orders. I get 1.5 ounces of cheese on my pizza because I am lactose intolerant and they ALWAYS delivery the perfect amount of light cheese per my request every …More

name: Brandon Nesbitt
text: Great pizza and who can ignore flavored crust! The past couple times I went I was disappointed but they have stepped it back up to the quality I know.

name: Kevin Hardy
text: Hungry Howie's always does a wonderful job when our family is in the mood for pizza. We love their thin crust, and the employees are always friendly and helpful. Their app makes ordering easy, and you can signup to receive specials by email.

name: Tina Gullo
text: This was the best pizza I have had in years. The crust was amazing.  The toppings were perfect.  I was so impressed by this pizza. You can tell the people in this pizza shop cares. Thank you. For making my day. T

name: Michael Clinton
text: A truly splendid pizzeria with an excellent selection of pies and toppings. I have never eaten the crust on a pizza but it’s so delicious here I can’t help it!  The manager is also wonderful and committed to making every interaction special.

name: Tina Russell
text: Really good food and the people are awesome. Only reason I did not give Howie's a Five (5) Star was due to seating (hate booth seating) and most of the drinks were out but what was there, was the good stuff. …More

name: Crystal Heyward
text: I went to Hungry Howies on 11/21/2020 around 9:45pm. When I arrived, 2 workers were out petting a dog. I thought maybe they were off until I saw one of the workers who had the dog lying on him, walked back in and go through the kitchen to …More

name: Roland Lawson
text: Nice staff and alot of choices when making your pizza. Their flavored crust is a personal favorite of mine.

name: Evelyn Sanders
text:
Their calzones were amazing! The crust was spot on.
Fast friendly service.

name: Douglas Johnson
text: Pizza ingredients are very fresh and the crust on the deep dish was cook right not over done

name: Illianna Drumheller
text: The pizza is always really good. My experience has always been good at this place. It's one of the best pizza i had.

name: Sarah Knauber Kelley
text:
I am from ohio.  We stopped in Columbia for 1 night. We had hungry Howie's delivered to the hotel. I was very impressed.  The food
was hot when delivered. The pizzas and breadsticks had a great flavor and …More

name: Donna Lambert
text: I love the all the different options and try to get something different each time I go.  The staff and owner is super nice and helpful!  My family stops here every time we come through town!

name: Patricia Mott
text: Pizza was very good. Wings, not do hot.

name: Sueheidy Rivera
text: 100x better than dominoes because it's not as thick and greasy so that's awesome and super fast delivery at exactly the time I wanted it to arrive. Also what an amazing deal. Buy one large and get one medium for $1!! I mean I paid less than $20 including a 20% tip so great! I just wish they delivered to Lexington! :(

name: Matthew J. Barnette
text: The pizza was decent, but the bread sticks weren't what I was hoping for and they got my address wrong on the delivery order. They also didn't add ranch dressing and they gave me pizza sauce in a tub instead of on the pizza itself like I asked. Alright prices, but flawed service.

name: Jorge Cervantes
text: Reminds me of home whenever i get pizza from here. Good tasting pizza

name: abi Shull
text: Very very helpful cashier! When I asked for my sandwich without cheese because I can't have dairy, he asked me about the butter they put in the bread. Most people wouldn't think about that. This was very good service.

name: Sepia-LaNae Hunter
text: Amazing service, they are great with flavors and they recommend amazing stuff

name: Nykia Adams
text: Great pizza and customer service

name: Robin Yolande
text: Called to place a delivery order and when I gave my address I was told it was out if their range. I asked what their range was because  looking at map that says its 4.6 miles down the SAME road. She says its 5 miles. I say I'm less than 5 and she's says no its 5.6. Needless to say, no more hungry Howie's for me.

name: bye u
text: The pizza is always great

name: Johnny Walls
text: Great customer service as well by Tommy! Thanks

text: My daughter and her family wanted to come over and play cards Friday. They were also hungry and didn't want to cook. My wife suggested Hungry Howie's pizza... …More

name: Jackson Snavely
text: I'm not sure how this place had 4.3 stars. It is like a Little Caesar's type pizza joint. I would not recommend. I ordered carry out and my pizza tasted like the chocolate chip cookie pie that was in the same warming rack. Extremely disappointed.

name: Laquita Mitchell
text: Pizza and wings are always delicious and hot.

text: Always great pizza and service. My only complaint is that there is only one in Columbia.

name: Stormy Nickson
text: It's not the nicest place and the pizza has a really weird flavor to it. Maybe that's just my personal preference, but I didn't like it.

name: Tracy H
text: Great tasting pizza with the best customer service around!  This place gets my order 9 times out of 10.  The butter cheese crust is totally awesome! I have never had a complaint about this place.

text: Best pizza I ever had

name: Mike Merriman
text: Food ok at best.  Cost to quality ratio ok.  Definitely not a place I'd go out of my way for pizza.

name: Amanda H
text: Used to LOVE ordering from Hungry Howies, but not tonight.  Both medium pizzas were messed up, AND they forgot my pizza.  Let’s just say this prego Mama is not very happy.  I get that people get extremely busy, but that’s not cool.

longer

text: Best. Pizza. Ever.

name: Nathan Morario
text: Decent pizza for relatively cheap, similar to Pizza hut pizza however slightly different. I would not return however as there are many better options for a similar or at most a slightly higher price point. The service was surprisingly good and not just decent as was the case with the pizza.

text: Awesome pizza.  Wonderful staff.

text: Amazing sandwiches!! Good pizza. Too high cost for delivery!!

name: Kellie Reeves
text: I love this Hungry Howies in Irmo. When I moved to Florida we had 3 in the area and none of them could even compare. Keep doing what your doing. I highly recommend this as a quick stop and eat place for lunch or dinner. And the service I got was great very friendly staff. Do yourself a favor a eat here.

name: Sum Bodi
text: I haven't been here in years seems like they never changed. The politeness of the men in there (there were no ladies if some work there) made me feel so happy. Great food! The Pizza, the sub, the wings & the brownies were fantastic!

name: Robert P
text: The only Hungry Howie's in town was good. The pizza and cheesy bread was excellent, there was a bit of a wait for the food, but the staff were very pleasant and good natured about it.

name: Ken M.
text: Customer since the early days in the 80s in Florida. Never had a problem out of this location. Pizzas have always been hot and fresh. Wife and I love the seasoned crazy bread and crusts. Friendly staff, prompt service, worth a visit..

name: James Galgano
text: I used to work here for most of my time in college and never got tired of the food, which is saying something because I used to eat here almost every night I worked. Moved away from the area for a time and came back to the Irmo area and was …More

text: Awesome pizza and cheese bread. Friendly staff.  They would get 5 stars if they didn't consistently forget to add my extra marinara sauce cups that I requested, to my order when my husband goes to pick it up. It's been two or three times now.

text: Hungry Howie's is a family favorite. Woman owned and operated business with fantastic food and excellent customer service. Pro-tip: You can get as many different flavoring combinations as you like on the crust, but they will also cover the entire surface of the pizza too, if you ask nicely! Follow on Twitter @HowiesIrmo.
